amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-210 to clarify that nothing in this act shall be construed to prohibit the use of arbitration on a voluntary basis when consent is given after the dispute arises.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fletcher amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Fletcher.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fletcher amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
